Accession	P10451;B2RDA1;Q15681;Q15682;Q15683;Q4W597;Q567T5;Q8NBK2;Q96IZ1
EntryName	OSTP_HUMAN
ProteinName	Osteopontin (Bone sialoprotein 1) (Nephropontin) (Secreted phosphoprotein 1) (SPP-1) (Urinary stone protein) (Uropontin)
GeneName	SPP1 BNSP OPN PSEC0156
Length	314
Function	Major non-collagenous bone protein that binds tightly to hydroxyapatite. Appears to form an integral part of the mineralized matrix. Probably important to cell-matrix interaction.
Subcellular Location	Secreted
